paramInformation.description: Some of these values have special behavior. Check the official device manual for specifics.

paramInformation.label: Reversed Reports for Input
paramInformation.description: Reverse the reported values for your selected input type (value 1). Expert users only. See manual for details.

metadata.inclusion: Click the Z-Wave button 3 times quickly. The LED indicator will blink green while processing. It will turn solid green for 2 seconds if inclusion is successful or turn solid red for 2 seconds if the pairing attempt fails.
metadata.exclusion: Click the Z-Wave button 3 times quickly. The LED indicator will blink green while processing. It will turn solid green for 2 seconds if successful or solid red for 2 seconds if exclusion fails.
metadata.reset: Click the Z-Wave button once and immediately after, press and hold the button for 15 seconds. The LED indicator will flash during the process and turn red for 3 seconds to confirm successful reset.
